Hospitals are overwhelmed, schools are disrupted, and citizen protests highlight systemic failures. Experts urge region-wide emission controls and waste management fixes to prevent a year-round health catastrophe.

description: The IDF revealed a vast Hamas tunnel network in southern Gaza, reportedly used to hold the body of soldier Hadar Goldin. This complex, stretching over seven kilometers and featuring numerous rooms, ran beneath civilian areas. Hamas returned Goldin's remains after 11 years, following his abduction during the 2014 Gaza War.

title: Emergency captaincy! Pant drops truth bomb — 'Not the best scenario'

Acknowledging the unusual circumstances, Pant expressed gratitude for the opportunity and emphasized focusing on winning the crucial match. He confirmed Gill's replacement is decided, praising the injured skipper's resilience. Pant aims for a balanced approach, blending conventional and innovative strategies for victory.

The examination schedule for third and fifth semester UG and third semester PG exams is available on the official website and college login portals. Students must download the admit card from www.rmlau.ac.in and carry it to the examination centre. Colleges are instructed to ensure smooth conduct of exams as per NEP 2020.

Before the tremors, Ireland showed resilience, reaching 113 with a vital partnership. description: The suicide note, recovered from the student's school bag, read, "I am very sorry I did this, but the school staff said so much that I had to do it. If any of my body (organs) works or is in condition to work, please donate it to someone who really needs it. My parents did a lot; I am sorry I couldn't give them anything. I'm sorry, brother, I was rude. I'm sorry, mother, I broke your heart so many times, now I will break it for the last time."

Concerns mount over the university's future, course accreditation, job prospects, and the substantial loans parents have taken for their children's expensive medical education.

title: Taylor Swift moves on with Travis Kelce, refuses Joe Alwyn’s plea for closure
description: Nearly two years after their breakup, reports resurfaced detailing Joe Alwyn's desire for a final conversation with Taylor Swift to find closure. However, Swift had already processed her emotions through music and moved on, finding healing and new love with Travis Kelce. Her friends supported her decision to avoid revisiting the past, prioritizing her current stability and future.

title: Savannah James gets emotional as daughter Zhuri joins new SZN Volleyball team
description: Savannah James celebrated her daughter Zhuri Nova's milestone as she begins her volleyball journey with the popular SZN team. Despite her family's basketball background, Zhuri Nova chose a different athletic path. The proud mother shared heartwarming clips and reflected on Zhuri Nova's 11th birthday, highlighting her daughter's intelligence and confidence.

title: Stephen Curry’s wife earns major nomination at 2025 Glossy Beauty Awards
description: Ayesha Curry's beauty brand, Sweet July Skin, has earned a nomination for Best Category Launch at the 2025 Glossy Beauty and Wellness Awards for its successful Lip Treatment. This recognition follows previous accolades for the brand, highlighting its growing impact in the beauty industry. The winners will be revealed on December 2, 2025.

title: LiAngelo ball goes platinum with breakout hit “Tweaker” featuring Drake
description: LiAngelo Ball, formerly a basketball player, has achieved a major milestone in music. His debut single 'Tweaker' has gone platinum. This success signifies a significant crossover from sports to the entertainment industry. The song became a cultural phenomenon, embraced by sports teams and charting highly. Ball's journey redefines his public identity and highlights his artistic ambition.
